an4.137:7.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlagaru hoti sīlādhipateyyo, samādhigaru hoti samādhādhipateyyo, paññāgaru hoti paññādhipateyyo.
an4.137:7.2: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
